summary.para: This Boolean field will cause CrashReportHandler to capture exceptions when set to true. By default enable capture exceptions is true.

The Performance Reporting service will keep a buffer of up to the last X log messages (Debug.Log, etc) to send along with crash reports. The default is 10 log messages, the max is 50. Set this to 0 to disable capture of logs with your crash reports.
Get a custom crash report metadata field that has been set.

returns.para: Value that was previously set for the key, or null if no value was found.

summary.para: Set a custom metadata key-value pair to be included with crash reports.
